summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LinkedIn Profile Search Tool. Backend APIs working correctly with one minor validation issue. Frontend UI and integration fully functional with excellent user experience.

minor_bugs.issue: Empty keywords search returns results instead of validation error
minor_bugs.impact: Users can search with empty keywords and get random results

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
LinkedIn profile search with filters working
Profile save functionality with duplicate prevention
Get saved profiles with search filtering
Frontend search form with all input fields
Search results display with thumbnails and snippets
Save profile button functionality and state management
Navigation between Search and Saved Profiles pages
Saved profiles filtering and clear filter functionality
Delete saved profiles with proper state updates
Responsive design on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Error handling and user feedback via toast notifications
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Add validation for empty keywords in search endpoint to return proper error message instead of random results. This is a minor enhancement and doesn't affect core functionality.
